messages.dateRevoked: The date for the match between **{player1}** and **{player2}** was __withdrawn__.
messages.dateOffered: **{date}** is now the __offered__ date for the match between **{player1}** and **{player2}**.
messages.dateAccepted: **{date}** is now the __approved__ date for the match between **{player1}** and **{player2}**.
messages.resultRevoked: The match result between **{player1}** and **{player2}** has been __removed__.
messages.resultOffered: The match between **{player1}** and **{player2}** has finished with the [result]({resultUrl}) **{result1}:{result2}**.
messages.resultApproved: The match between **{player1}** and **{player2}** has finished with the confirmed [result]({resultUrl}) **{result1}:{result2}**.
